    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107575</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Charging and discharging a capacitor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufladung und einen Kondensator entladend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chargeant et déchargeant un condensateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carregando e descarregando um capacitor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caricando e scaricando un condensatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρέωση και εκφόρτιση ενός πυκνωτή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cargando y descargando un condensador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These circuit diagrams show how capacitors are charged using a cell (left) and how the charged capacitor (centre) is discharged using a resistor (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Capacitor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charged capacitor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">discharged capacitor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">discharging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Resistor</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Schaltpläne zeigen, wie Kondensatoren mit 
einer Zelle aufgeladen werden (nach links) und wie der belastete 
Kondensator (Mitte) mit einem Widerstand entladen wird (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces schémas de circuit montrent comment des 
condensateurs sont chargés en utilisant une cellule (à gauche) et 
comment le condensateur chargé (centre) est déchargé à l'aide 
d'une résistance (droite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas de circuito mostram como os 
capacitores são carregados usando uma pilha (à esquerda) e como o 
capacitor carregado (centro) é descarregado usando um resistor 
(direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi circuitali mostrano come i 
condensatori sono caricati usando una cellula (a sinistra) e come il 
condensatore caricato (centro) è scaricato per mezzo di un resistore 
(di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα κυκλωμάτων επιδεικνύουν πώς οι 
πυκνωτές χρεώνονται χρησιμοποιώντας ένα κύτταρο (αριστερά) και 
πώς ο χρεωμένος πυκνωτής (κέντρο) απαλλάσσεται χρησιμοποιώντας 
έναν αντιστάτη (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos esquemas circulares muestran cómo se 
cargan los condensadores usando una célula (a la izquierda) y cómo 
se descarga el condensador cargado (centro) usando un resistor 
(derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">belasteter Kondensator</string>
          </keyword>
